levelList.name: สิ่งกีดขวาง
levelList.desc:
Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 100%)
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 2 ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on target (max 5)
[WhenUse] ได้รับ +3 [Breath] จำนวนครั้ง

levelList.name: Double Chaincleave
levelList.desc:
Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 100%)
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 2 ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on target (max 5)
[WhenUse] ได้รับ +3 [Breath] จำนวนครั้ง

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง +3 [Laceration] จำนวนครั้ง
[OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง +3 [Vibration] จำนวนครั้ง

levelList.name: Harpoon Throw
levelList.desc:
Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 200%)
[WhenUse] ได้รับ 2 [CriticalDmgUpVespa] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise Stagger Threshold by 80% of damage dealt

levelList.name: Harpoon Impalement - There It Is.
levelList.desc:
[CantChangeTarget]
Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 300%)
[WhenUse] ได้รับ 5 [CriticalDmgUpVespa] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

levelList.name: Harpoon Recall
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 200%)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Remove the Nested Harpoon on target

levelList.name: Counterattack.
levelList.desc: [DuelCounter] Deal +50% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 100%) [StartBattle] Gain 1 [SupportProtect] [WhenUse] ได้รับ 2 [ResultEnhancement] and 2 [AttackDmgUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง +3 [Vibration] จำนวนครั้ง
